title: The Sleeping Tiger (1954, Film-Noir) Wild temptation turns a saint into a sinner

sources.title: The Sleeping Tiger (1954, Film-Noir) Wild temptation turns a saint into a sinner
sources.description:
Hidden deep within every woman is a Sleeping Tiger ... when aroused it can turn a saint into a sinner!
Frank Clemmons, a convicted criminal, agrees to a rehabilitation program after breaking into a psychotherapist's home. However, the psychotherapist's wife, Glenda, becomes attracted to him, leading to dangerous consequences.

The Sleeping Tiger is a 1954 British film noir directed by Joseph Losey.


Main Actors:
Dirk Bogarde - Frank Clemmons
Alexis Smith -  Glenda Esmond
Alexander Knox - Dr. Clive Esmond
Hugh Griffith - The Inspector
Patricia McCarron - Sally the maid
Maxine Audley - Carol
Glyn Houston - Bailey

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/at6lWjNFblM


00:00 -  Full Movie with subtitles
01:55 - Dr. Esmond confronts Frank Clemens, a young criminal, and offers him a chance at rehabilitation instead of prison.
05:26 - Glenda Esmond returns home, skeptical of Frank's presence, and tension builds between the household members.
20:47 - Frank begins to challenge Glenda's composed exterior, leading to a heated exchange that reveals deeper emotions.
41:08 - Glenda and Frank's relationship takes a dangerous turn as they grow closer, testing the boundaries of trust and loyalty.
1:00:32 - Frank's criminal past resurfaces, and Inspector Simmons intensifies his investigation, putting everyone on edge.
1:15:21 - Together they plan to escape together, but their conflicting emotions and loyalties create chaos.
1:22:50 - A tragic confrontation leads to Glenda's desperate actions, culminating in a fatal car accident.

@CultCinemaClassics
